title: France panorama. [No. 72/19]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The referendum - the referendum for the enlargement of the Common Market. 2. In the news: Rural equipment - in Valence, a new architectural design for a water-tower. Gold engravings by Tremois - solid gold engravings. 3. French publications - authors, publications and publishers. 4. Plant-life and the atom - the X-ray Agronomical Laboratories of the Cadarache Nuclear Studies Center. 5. In the overseas France museum - rare specimens.
